channel.title: Yale Dining Menu & Nutrition Center
channel.description: RSS Feed of daily dining location menus.

item.title: Jonathan Edwards Menu for Mon, Mar 14, 16
item.description:
Menus as served are subject to local changes.


Brunch
THE SALAD
  • At The Salad Bar build-your-own salad using a variety of salad greens, fresh vegetables, plant proteins, other toppings and salad dressings.
THE DELI
  • Make-your-own Sandwich from turkey breast, ham, hummus, assorted cheeses, assorted sandwich salads, lettuce leaves, sliced tomatoes, sliced red onion, pickles, assorted spreads, breads and rolls.

Lunch
ENTREES
  • Buffalo Chicken Thighs
THE SOUP
  • Amish Corn and Chicken Soup [E] [SY] [W] [G]
THE SALAD
  • Superfood Slaw with Apple Cider Vinaigrette, Pecans, and Golden Raisins [V] [A] [N] [VT]
  • White Bean Salad with Watercress, Rainbow Chard, and Parmesan Cheese [D] [VT]
  • Caesar Salad [D] [FS] [SY] [W] [G]
STARCHES
  • Vegan Baked Beans [V] [VT]
  • Penne Pasta [V] [W] [G] [VT]
  • All-Natural Tomato Sauce [V] [VT]
  • Pesto Alfredo Sauce [D] [SY] [VT]
THE VEGETABLES
  • Roasted Broccoli Florets [V] [VT]
  • Baked Acorn Squash [VT]
DESSERTS
  • Triple Fudge Cookies [A] [D] [E] [SY] [W] [G] [VT]
  • Butterscotch Blondies [A] [D] [E] [SY] [W] [G] [VT]
THE GRILL
  • The Naked Hummel Nitrate-Free Hot Dog [SY] [W] [G]
CEREALS
  • Whole-Grain Irish Oatmeal [V] [VT]
ACCOMPANIMENTS
  • Western Picnic Hot Dog Toppings [D] [P]
  • Corn Dog Toppings [P]
  • Firecracker Hot Dog Toppings [D] [VT]
  • Blue Cheese Dip [D] [VT]

Dinner
ENTREES
  • Herb Crusted Pork Loin with Port Wine Sauce [A] [D] [P] [SY] [W] [G]
  • Caramelized Onions and Gouda Flatbreads [D] [SY] [W] [G] [VT]
  • Braised Lentils with Kale [V] [SY] [VT]
THE SOUP
  • Amish Corn and Chicken Soup [E] [SY] [W] [G]
THE SALAD
  • White Bean Salad with Watercress, Rainbow Chard, and Parmesan Cheese [D] [VT]
  • Superfood Slaw with Apple Cider Vinaigrette, Pecans, and Golden Raisins [V] [A] [N] [VT]
  • Caesar Salad [D] [FS] [SY] [W] [G]
  • At The Salad Bar build-your-own salad using a variety of salad greens, fresh vegetables, plant proteins, other toppings and salad dressings.
THE DELI
  • Make-your-own Sandwich from turkey breast, ham, hummus, assorted cheeses, assorted sandwich salads, lettuce leaves, sliced tomatoes, sliced red onion, pickles, assorted spreads, breads and rolls.
STARCHES
  • Buttered Egg Noodles with Parsley [D] [E] [W] [G] [VT]
THE VEGETABLES
  • Steamed Brussels Sprouts [V] [VT]
  • Roasted Cauliflower [V] [VT]
DESSERTS
  • Angel Food Cake [A] [E] [W] [G] [VT]
THE GRILL
  • Chicken Schnitzel [D] [E] [W] [G]
  • Grilled-to-order All-Natural Burgers and Cheeseburgers, All-Natural Chicken Breasts, and Vegan Black Bean Veggie Burgers.

Dietary & Food Allergy Codes

[VT] Vegetarian Entrees

item.title: Marigolds Menu for Mon, Mar 14, 16
item.description:
Menus as served are subject to local changes.


Lunch
ENTREES
  • All Natural burgers, Gardenburgers, black bean burgers, chicken breasts, breaded chicken filet, spicy chicken wings, chicken tenders, onion rings and French fries.
THE SALAD
  • At The Salad Bar build-your-own salad using a variety of salad greens, fresh vegetables, plant proteins, animal proteins, other toppings, and salad dressings.
THE DELI
  • All-Natural Ham and Swiss Sandwich with Apricot Jam on Whole Wheat Bread [D] [P]
  • Tuna Nicoise Sandwich on Pumpernickel Bread [FS] [W] [G]
  • Thai Curry Sandwich on a Brioche Roll [D] [E] [SY] [W]
  • All-Natural Turkey Sandwich with Swiss Cheese and Sour Cherry Mustard on a Multigrain Roll [A] [D] [SY] [W] [G]
  • Roast Beef Sandwich with Spicy Feta and Balsamic Onions on a Rosemary Roll [D] [W] [G]
